issue.title: [CF 1229] Debuff Bar Disappears Early
issue.body:
What is the issue?

I just started to use TellMeWhen. I have setup a bar group to tract the dots on my affliction warlock. Each bars shows on the screen when the corresponding dot is applied to the target. However, the bar does not display the entire length of the dot. For example the Agony dot starts at twenty four seconds and disappears after seven seconds of being applied. Each of the dots disappear after seven seconds of being applied. I created an icon group and the dots will stay displayed the entire length.  I have searched the internet and watched YouTube videos and read forums, and have not found an answer. If I am missing a configuration in the setup I am sorry for wasting your time. Any help on this issue would be greatly appreciated. I copied and pasted the text string of my bar group below if that would be helpful. If you need anything else from me just let me know. Thanks in advance.
